messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] hi all from new member
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/1/2004 8:56:03 AM Eastern Daylight Time, nancyhoegen@email.com writes: Just  wanted to say hello and introduce myself. I live in
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/1/2004 8:56:03 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
nancyhoegen@... writes:

Just wanted to say hello and introduce myself. I live in Northbridge,
MA & homeschool my 11 y.o daughter, Amanda. She is active in dance,
singing & regional theater. She also swims & plays basketball at the
Whitin Community Center. We've only been homeschooling since Jan.
2004, but we already feel like veterans. LOL We wish everyone a fun &
safe summer.
Best -



<<<<

Northbridge, MA? So I assume we will be seeing you at the Live and Learn
Unschooling Conference in Peabody, MA August 27-29?

~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: hi all from new member
messages.msgSnippet: Hello all - Just wanted to say hello and introduce myself. I live in Northbridge, MA & homeschool my 11 y.o daughter, Amanda. She is active in dance, singing &
messages.messageBody:
Hello all -
Just wanted to say hello and introduce myself. I live in Northbridge,
MA & homeschool my 11 y.o daughter, Amanda. She is active in dance,
singing & regional theater. She also swims & plays basketball at the
Whitin Community Center. We've only been homeschooling since Jan.
2004, but we already feel like veterans. LOL We wish everyone a fun &
safe summer.
Best -
Nancy Hoegen
